long_description: Sophisticated in design, the Osprey Exos 46 Pack offers comfort and super-light weight without a sacrifice in ventilation. Use it for thru-hikes to weekend hikes. Aluminum frame transfers weight to hips; breathable mesh backpanel has side ventilation for cool comfort. Ventilated, padded shoulder straps; sternum strap has a built-in whistle and pocket for energy gel. ErgoPull hipbelt closure relieves hipbone pressure by spreading the tension along both the top and the bottom of the belt, not in a single line along the middle. Innovative system allows you to stow and remove trekking poles without taking off the pack. Top-loading design features a floating lid pocket; another pocket under the lid further extends your gear storage options. Features a front pocket with vertical zipper, a stretch-woven front pocket, side mesh pockets and zippered mesh pockets on hipbelt. Hydration design places the reservoir (sold separately) in a cavity behind the back panel for easy refilling. Superlight side compression straps route over or under side pockets. Thin tool loop and bungee tie-off let you strap on an ice tool. Osprey Exos 46 Pack has an adjustable sternum strap and integrated sleeping pad straps. Closeout.
short_description: Sophisticated in design, the Osprey Exos 46 Pack offers comfort and super-light weight without a sacrifice in ventilation. Use it for thru-hikes to weekend hikes.
